Narada-Purana (or Naradiya-Purana), Part 1

Input by members of the Sansknet project
(www.sansknet.org)

This GRETIL version has been converted from a custom Devanagari encoding.
Therefore, word boundaries are usually not marked by blanks.
These and other irregularities cannot be standardized at present.

After many corrections, the text is still in need of proof-reading!

evaü karmapà÷aniyantritajantatavaş svargàdipuõyasthàneùu puõyabhogamanubhåya yàtãva duşkhataraü pàpaphalamanubhåya prakùãõakarmà va÷eùeõàmuü lokamàgatya sarvabhayavihvaleùu mçtyubàdhàsaüyuteùusthàvaràdiùu jàyate  /

praõavo hçdayaü viùõurnentaş surapatistathà  /
mahàbalàya svàhànto mantro vasudharàkùaraş  // NarP_1,72.1 //
